sentence: When reminded my travel agent called and spoke with them then the uninterested employee reluctantly called the company and nearly threw the receiver at me
Their free internet service is only for two devices so if you have more than one cell phone and computer laptop the service shuts down until you have only two devices connected
The pool and beach area is nice but the service is below average
The room service menu is a joke the most basic and overpriced meal Options
We are Hilton Honors members and are extremely disappointed at the level of service here
The service in the bar was terrible and the quality of the food drink was lacking
Their was no urgency or sorys from the front desk just continued offers to move us
My only issue was with the woman who was the Concierge she said she would take care of making reservations for us and never did

I have been to many Hiltons over the years and love them that is why I go back but this one is not to that standard front desk is under staffed which ment long wait times pressure for upgrading at check in for something I already paid for was agitating to evening pool towels missing tile and power cords in the hot tub our room patio railing was very wiggly and loose from the wall
During our breakfast service our waiters name was Orlando Lopez
The staff are friendly and the rooms are clean
Miguel Taisha from Front Desk friendly amazing personality Arlen from the pool even though she was busy she never forgot to visit us and asked if we needed anything else
Amazing staff and location
The staff was extremely friendly and they have a cool lobby bar
That kind of work ethic is exactly what every employer should be extremely thankful for in an employee
Incredibly attentive staff during a room incident
The swim up bar staff were the best and provided great entertainment
The front desk was pleasant and efficient and the room was superb
The actual beach itself leaves a little to be desired but the multitude of pools were great clean and had very quick polside service
The location is lovely and the staff is very pleasant and helpful
